text: Surana PU College is a pre-university college in Bangalore, Karnataka, India.Retrieved from Google Maps https://www.google.com/maps/place/Deeksha,+Kengeri,+Bengaluru/@12.914917,77.481333,13z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0xc9bddceefa2b9fde!8m2!3d12.9149166!4d77.4813332?hl=en- GB It is affiliated to Karnataka Pre-University Education Board.Retrieved from Department of Pre University Education, Karnataka http://pue.kar.nic.in/PUE/PDF_files/colleges/AS.pdf It is located at 1st Main, Kengeri Satellite Town, Mysore Road.Retrieved from National Informatics Centre, Karnatka State Unit http://www.kar.nic.in/pue/PUE/PDF_files/colleges/AS.TXT ==Streams offered== The College offers courses in the below mentioned commerce and science streams 1\. CEBA - Computer Science, Economics, Business Studies, Accountancy 2\. SEBA - Statistics, Economics, Business Studies, Accountancy 3\. PCMB - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Biology 4\. PCMC - Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, Computer Science ==References== Category:Pre University colleges in Karnataka Category:High schools and secondary schools in Bangalore
title: Surana PU College
